id: Brazil’s President-Elect Calls On Government to Pass Pension Bill
paragraph:
November 17, 2018BRASÍLIA—Brazil’s president-elect urged the current administration to revive a pension overhaul before his inauguration on Jan. 1, a move cheered by markets as crucial to jump-starting an ailing economy. Jair Bolsonaro, who won 55% of the vote in Sunday’s runoff, plans to start talks next week with President Michel Temer to try to pass a stalled pension reform plan by the end of this year.“Any...
